nl.inl.blacklab.search.indexmetadata

Interface Annotation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockAnnotation

    public interface Annotation
    An annotation on an annotated field.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      boolean isInternal()

      Is this a subannotation?

      Return the Lucene field prefix for this annotation.

      Return which sensitivity-indexing contains character offset information.

      Get names of the subannotations for this annotation.

      Get the subannotation name, if this is a subannotation.
      default String subpropValuePrefix()
      Return prefix for the value we're searching for, if any.
      String uiType()
      What type of UI should be shown for this annotation? Note that BlackLab doesn't do anything with this value; it is merely a convenience for the frontend.

    • Method Detail

      • indexMetadata

        IndexMetadata indexMetadata()

      • field

        AnnotatedField field()
        Returns:
        field for which this is an annotation

      • name

        String name()
        Returns:
        this annotation's name

      • subName

        String subName()
        Get the subannotation name, if this is a subannotation.
        Returns:
        subannotation name, or null if this is not a subannotation

      • isSubannotation

        boolean isSubannotation()
        Is this a subannotation?
        Returns:
        true if is, false if not

      • parentAnnotation

        Annotation parentAnnotation()
        If this is a subannotation, return its parent annotation.
        Returns:
        parent annotation or null if this is not a subannotation

      • uiType

        String uiType()
        What type of UI should be shown for this annotation? Note that BlackLab doesn't do anything with this value; it is merely a convenience for the frontend.
        Returns:
        desired UI type

      • description

        String description()

      • hasForwardIndex

        boolean hasForwardIndex()

      • offsetsSensitivity

        AnnotationSensitivity offsetsSensitivity()
        Return which sensitivity-indexing contains character offset information. Note that there may not be such a sensitivity-indexing.
        Returns:
        the alternative, or null if there is none.

      • sensitivities

        Collection<AnnotationSensitivity> sensitivities()
        What sensitivity alternatives were indexed for this annotation?
        Returns:
        the sensitivity setting

      • hasSensitivity

        boolean hasSensitivity(MatchSensitivity sensitivity)
        Was this annotation indexed with the sensitivity specified?
        Parameters:
        sensitivity - desired sensitivity
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if not

      • sensitivity

        AnnotationSensitivity sensitivity(MatchSensitivity sensitivity)
        Get a reference to the specified sensitivity.
        Parameters:
        sensitivity - desired sensitivity
        Returns:
        reference to the specified sensitivity.

      • displayName

        String displayName()

      • isInternal

        boolean isInternal()
        Is this 'annotation' internal to BlackLab? Some 'annotations' are not really annotations from the input files, but internal information for BlackLab. These shouldn't be shown in the user interface.
        Returns:
        true if the annotation is internal

      • luceneFieldPrefix

        default String luceneFieldPrefix()
        Return the Lucene field prefix for this annotation.
        Returns:
        Lucene field prefix

      • forwardIndexIdField

        default String forwardIndexIdField()

      • subannotation

        Annotation subannotation(String subName)
        Get subannotation descriptor. Only valid for old-style indexes! (IndexMetadata.subannotationsStoredWithParent() == true) Note that subannotations are not (yet) declared in index structure, so this will always succeed, even if the subannotation wasn't actually indexed. In that case, no hits will be found.
        Parameters:
        subName - subannotation name
        Returns:
        subannotation descriptor

      • subannotationNames

        Set<String> subannotationNames()
        Get names of the subannotations for this annotation. Only valid for new-style indexes! (IndexMetadata.subannotationsStoredWithParent() == false)
        Returns:
        names of annotations that are considered subannotations of this annotation

      • equals

        boolean equals(Object obj)
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object

      • hashCode

        int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object

      • subpropValuePrefix

        default String subpropValuePrefix()
        Return prefix for the value we're searching for, if any. We used to index subannotations in the same field as their parent annotation, with the values prefixed. We don't do this anymore, but for old indexes, this is still relevant.
        Returns:

      • setSubAnnotation

        void setSubAnnotation(Annotation parentAnnotation)
